Fresno.Fresno City College: Fresno City College (FCC or "Fresno City") is a community college in Fresno, California. Fresno City College is a part of the State Center Community College District (SCCCD), within the California Community Colleges system, and fully accredited by the Accrediting Commission for Community and Junior Colleges of the Western Association of Schools and Colleges. The school offers Associate's Degrees, and students can earn a Certificate of Completion, or transfer to a 4-year university of their choice.
